name: Rohan Sign.
quote: Absolutely the best biryani I've had. The mutton was incredibly tender. Highly recommended!

name: Priya Singh
quote: The vegetarian biryani was a revelation! So flavourful and aromatic. A must-try for everyone.

name: Ankit Verma
quote: Great ambience and even better food. The service was quick and the staff was courteous.

name: Sneha P.
quote: The King Prawn Biryani is a game-changer. Perfectly spiced and cooked to perfection. Will be back!

name: Vikram N.
quote: A solid place for a family dinner. The chicken biryani was delicious and the portions were generous.
